verses.name: John 19:13
verses.text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying, he brought Jesus forth, and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement, but in the Hebrew, Gabbatha.

verses.name: John 19:14
verses.text: And it was the preparation of the passover, and about the sixth hour: and he saith unto the Jews, Behold your King!

verses.name: John 19:15
verses.text: But they cried out, Away with him, away with him, crucify him. Pilate saith unto them, Shall I crucify your King? The chief priests answered, We have no king but Cesar.
